data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deschodt, Christian M., Davis, Adrian L. V. (2019): New southern African species and a revalidation in the dung beetle genus Gyronotus van Lansberge, 1874 (Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) with an updated key. Zootaxa 4624 (2): 275-282, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.2.10|5 occurrences
